summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Flawless Finish Foundation, Colour Changing Foundation, All-Day Flawless Foundation Makeup, Covering Imperfections Liquid Complete Foundation, Suitable for ALL Skin Types Review Date: 2019/08/29 Store: CIDBEST Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.49 x 1.65 x 1.3 inches; 4.13 Ounces'} Review Text: This makeup is crazy. It comes out of the bottle looking like a white colored moisturizer. When applied to the face, it immediately begins to blend with the color of the skin right before your eyes. It has somewhat of a weird smell if you put your nose up to the bottle. I didn't notice it once I applied or throughout the day. This makeup does not come off onto your clothes like regular foundation. It comes off the same way it went on. When applying it, it goes on more like moisturizer then makeup. Its got SPF in it so it takes an extra swipe or two to get it to completely blend in but when it does its so lightweight, you don't even notice its there. It just leaves your skin feeling soft and smooth. Oh and you don't get that later in the day shiney look with this makeup. It really is pretty cool stuff! Review Title: Doesn't leave marks on clothes! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Flawless Liquid Foundation Cream, Liquid Foundation, Colour Changing Foundation, BB Cream, Long Lasting, Invisible Pores, Base Nude Face Moisturizing Liquid Cover Concealer,Universal for ALL Skin Type Review Date: 2019/09/27 Store: Cherioll Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Cherioll', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Unit Count': '1.35 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '4.76 x 1.57 x 1.5 inches; 3.63 Ounces'} Review Text: This foundation is like no other foundation. It is definitely not your average foundation. It blends in almost immediately with your own skin color because of this, it never looks caked on or leaves makeup lines around the jawline. It has an SPF coverage of 15 which is a nice added bonus. The foundation seems to leave a nice cross between matte and dewy while minimizing the pores. It is much more moisturizing then the average foundation also. My skin used to be on the dryer side and now I have normal skin thanks to this product. Review Title: Colour Changing Foundation Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Rapid Reduction Eye Cream, Under Eye Cream, Under-Eye Bags Treatment, Instant Results within 120 Seconds, Rapidly Reducing Bagginess, Puffiness, Dark Circles and Wrinkles - 2Pcs Review Date: 2019/10/10 Store: CIDBEST Average Rating: 2.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'CIDBEST', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Use for': 'Eyes', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Sensitive, Dry, Normal', 'Package Dimensions': '3.6 x 1.1 x 0.8 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '778299241700'} Review Text: This under eye cream is amazing. The first time I used it, I could immediately see the difference. It says you must apply it and wait expressionless for the 2 minutes after but I didn't even have to wait two minutes to see that there was a noticeable difference.
Its easy to use, you just clip the plastic tip off and apply. There isn't a noticeable scent and the texture is soft and goes on smoothly but seems to soak in more abruptly then other eye creams. When I say abruptly, I mean it kind of almost begins to feel chalky or glue-ish when it begins to soak in. It leaves the skin feeling soft and smooth for the entire day.
I did notice that there isn't much for directions as to how often to apply it. Review Title: Immediately see the difference... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Concealer Cream,Makeup concealer,Skin Lightening Whitening Cream,Waterproof Smooth Flawless Finish Creamy Concealer ,Suitable for s eye circles, striated lines, scars, acne, spots Review Date: 2019/10/31 Store: SCOBUTY Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Color': 'Ivory', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Package Dimensions': '7.72 x 5.43 x 0.47 inches; 2.05 Ounces', 'UPC': '778716277046'} Review Text: This 3 pack of cream concealer is well, very concealing! Its thick and maybe that is why it is a challenge to get out of the twist tube every time. I felt as though I was twisting forever before anything came out and then when it finally did, it wouldn't stop! It was like an explosion of concealer and it unfortunately seems to do this with every use. With this concealer, you don't need much of it or it will begin to looked 'caked on". I would recommend getting a small container ready to put the extra in before beginning to use it.
Because of the 3 pack, you can blend them to match almost any skin tone which is a great feature. The clear containers also is a great feature too! Review Title: Makeup concealer Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: W-Airfit Primer Face Makeup Base Pink Isolation Cream Invisible Pore,Cover Acne Marks,Smooth Skin,Oil Control Moisturizing Essence Concealer Foundation (1 pack) Review Date: 2019/12/23 Store: Lofu Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Lofu', 'Product Benefits': 'Oil Control', 'Coverage': 'Lightweight,Medium', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'Dry Skin,Oily', 'Package Dimensions': '5.16 x 1.38 x 0.94 inches; 1.66 Ounces', 'UPC': '791352429549'} Review Text: I was surprised by how lightweight this primer is. The texture reminds me of a light moisturizer which is different. I also like that I can build it up for more coverage so on days when I don't need as much, I don't use as much and vise versa! it is a nice change of pace. It doesnt have a smell that I noticed at all or much of a color to it so it won't stain anything if you have an accident. It did seem to 'hold' my makeup on well throughout the day into the early evening. Although I am used to primers that have more of a pore minimizing effect to them, this is still a good value for the money. Review Title: Lightweight Primer Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Moisturising Cream, Body and Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Acne Cream, 2PC Review Date: 2019/12/29 Store: Cherioll Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Cherioll', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.1 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Use for': 'Whole Body, Face', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 1.65 x 1 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '041388002378 746827880882', 'Manufacturer': 'Cherioll'} Review Text: The wintertime is so drying & my dad hands tend to get such bad dry skin that it cracks, exposing painful lesions all over.
We both started using it the first day it arrived. Much to both of our surprises, it immediately began showing noticeable results on the first application. When I say immediate, I mean right after we applied it our skin was much softer. It wasn't that noticeable on the areas that were already healthy and soft. The areas with cracked or excessively dry skin were immediately transformed into soft and moisturized skin. It feels kind of tingly and minty going on also.
As far as the smell goes, its not noticeable unless you are trying to smell it which I probably wouldn't because what I can smell of it, I didn't really hate it but I definitely wasn't into it either. It's a strange rusted orange color but does not leave stains on anything because it soaks into fabric/clothes just as regular lotion does. The texture is a nice, thick one but considering, it soaks into the skin fairly fast. Actually quicker then most other thick creams used for this purpose. Review Title: Immediate Results... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Body Wax Strips, Hair Removal Waxing Strips for Face Legs Underarms Brazilian Bikini Women with 40 Count Cold Wax Strips and 5 Post Wipes Review Date: 2020/02/06 Store: CARETHYS Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Strip', 'Brand': 'CARETHYS', 'Number of Items': '50', 'Unit Count': '80 Count', 'Use for': 'Legs, Face', 'Package Dimensions': '7.6 x 5.9 x 0.8 inches; 4.8 Ounces'} Review Text: I purchased these body wax strips and began using them only a few days after letting my hair grow out. I didn't think it would be long enough because I could barely see it with a lighted mirror but it was. It took a lot less time then I assumed it would and it didn't hurt much at all. The results were better then I had imagined. My skin was left soft and smooth. It took me 30 minutes my first time using them on my face and decollate area. They are very easy to cut into smaller pieces with a regular kitchen scissors but make sure to clean it off with soap and water afterwards.
Things to remember when using...really get the wax warm before applying (I used a space heater set on low instead of warming the wax in my hands for 30 seconds prior to using). It will help the wax grip to the hair better so you will get better results. When pulling the paper off of skin, always pull up and not out against the way the hair is growing. Use one hand to hold the skin taught before pulling up on the paper. This will also help you get more effective results. Review Title: Fast & Effective... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: goPure ACTIVES Retinol Serum for Face - Anti Aging Serum, Face Serum, Eye Serum with Clinically Proven Bakuchiol Oil - Pore Minimizer Facial Serum and Dark Spot Remover for Face - 1oz Review Date: 2020/07/08 Store: goPure Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.1 x 1.5 x 1.4 inches; 1 Ounces', 'UPC': '709618228485'} Review Text: I have been pleasantly surprised by this product. I have been an esthetician for 2 decades now and I love to find products that stand out to me like this one did. It is kind of a different color than I would have expected but it doesn't leave marks on clothes, etc. It soaks into the skin quickly and does a fantastic job of exfoliation. Review Title: Impressive Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Nose and Ear Hair Trimmer USB Rechargeable, 4 in 1 Upgraded Electronic Men Painless Eyebrow & Facial Hair Trimmer, Lightweight Eyebrow and Facial Hair Gentleman Trimmer With Waterproof Head Review Date: 2020/07/28 Store: PIONEO Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Trimming', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Item Weight': '170 Grams', 'Brand': 'PIONEO', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Cordless, Rechargeable', 'Product Dimensions': '1.3 x 5.31 x 4.06 inches; 6 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SM-409S', 'Batteries': '1 AA batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '782911297174 782938780475 759587147904', 'Manufacturer': 'VIAFOIA'} Review Text: This clipper has several different heads that are easy to switch out. The heads can be switched out with the twist of the top then you just pop the other one on with another twist. So it is easy enough to use plus it is wireless! We didn't need to recharge it for almost 30 days exactly! So it definitely holds a good charge and it doesn't take long to fully charge. I like all of the different attachment options but I would have liked it if it came with a stand or a bag to keep track of everything when it is not being used. Review Title: Wireless Nose & Ear Trimmer... Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 20 Pcs Lip Gloss Tubes Empty Balm Bottles Lip Balm Tubes for DIY Cosmetic Sample Containers Review Date: 2020/09/07 Store: JANYUN Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'JANYUN', 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Unit Count': '20.00 Count'} Review Text: This is the cutest set for DIY lip balm or lipsticks. They are so unique and definitely get noticed every single time you take them out and use them! My friends always have to touch them and hold them because just looking at them isn't enough. They want one for themselves with each new tube design they see. I am beginning to realize these would be a great idea for a DIY home based business. They are so unique and they actually are a good quality product. I am not sure how many times the lip brush can be used over and over again but I am looking into replacing them and it doesn't look like it will be a problem. Review Title: Super Cute!!! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details: 1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked. 2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked. 3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects. Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: Flawless Finish Foundation, Colour Changing Foundation, All-Day Flawless Foundation Makeup, Covering Imperfections Liquid Complete Foundation, Suitable for ALL Skin Types Review Date: 2019/08/29 Store: CIDBEST Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.49 x 1.65 x 1.3 inches; 4.13 Ounces'} Review Text: This makeup is crazy. When I say immediate, I mean right after we applied it our skin was much softer. It wasn't that noticeable on the areas that were already healthy and soft. The areas with cracked or excessively dry skin were immediately transformed into soft and moisturized skin. It feels kind of tingly and minty going on also.
As far as the smell goes, its not noticeable unless you are trying to smell it which I probably wouldn't because what I can smell of it, I didn't really hate it but I definitely wasn't into it either. It's a strange rusted orange color but does not leave stains on anything because it soaks into fabric/clothes just as regular lotion does. The texture is a nice, thick one but considering, it soaks into the skin fairly fast. Actually quicker then most other thick creams used for this purpose. Review Title: Immediate Results... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Body Wax Strips, Hair Removal Waxing Strips for Face Legs Underarms Brazilian Bikini Women with 40 Count Cold Wax Strips and 5 Post Wipes Review Date: 2020/02/06 Store: CARETHYS Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Strip', 'Brand': 'CARETHYS', 'Number of Items': '50', 'Unit Count': '80 Count', 'Use for': 'Legs, Face', 'Package Dimensions': '7.6 x 5.9 x 0.8 inches; 4.8 Ounces'} Review Text: I purchased these body wax strips and began using them only a few days after letting my hair grow out. I didn't think it would be long enough because I could barely see it with a lighted mirror but it was. It took a lot less time then I assumed it would and it didn't hurt much at all. The results were better then I had imagined. My skin was left soft and smooth. It took me 30 minutes my first time using them on my face and decollate area. They are very easy to cut into smaller pieces with a regular kitchen scissors but make sure to clean it off with soap and water afterwards.
Things to remember when using...really get the wax warm before applying (I used a space heater set on low instead of warming the wax in my hands for 30 seconds prior to using). It will help the wax grip to the hair better so you will get better results. When pulling the paper off of skin, always pull up and not out against the way the hair is growing. Use one hand to hold the skin taught before pulling up on the paper. This will also help you get more effective results. Review Title: Fast & Effective... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: goPure ACTIVES Retinol Serum for Face - Anti Aging Serum, Face Serum, Eye Serum with Clinically Proven Bakuchiol Oil - Pore Minimizer Facial Serum and Dark Spot Remover for Face - 1oz Review Date: 2020/07/08 Store: goPure Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.1 x 1.5 x 1.4 inches; 1 Ounces', 'UPC': '709618228485'} Review Text: I have been pleasantly surprised by this product. I have been an esthetician for 2 decades now and I love to find products that stand out to me like this one did. It is kind of a different color than I would have expected but it doesn't leave marks on clothes, etc. It soaks into the skin quickly and does a fantastic job of exfoliation. Review Title: Impressive Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Nose and Ear Hair Trimmer USB Rechargeable, 4 in 1 Upgraded Electronic Men Painless Eyebrow & Facial Hair Trimmer, Lightweight Eyebrow and Facial Hair Gentleman Trimmer With Waterproof Head Review Date: 2020/07/28 Store: PIONEO Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Trimming', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Item Weight': '170 Grams', 'Brand': 'PIONEO', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Cordless, Rechargeable', 'Product Dimensions': '1.3 x 5.31 x 4.06 inches; 6 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SM-409S', 'Batteries': '1 AA batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '782911297174 782938780475 759587147904', 'Manufacturer': 'VIAFOIA'} Review Text: This clipper has several different heads that are easy to switch out. The heads can be switched out with the twist of the top then you just pop the other one on with another twist. So it is easy enough to use plus it is wireless! We didn't need to recharge it for almost 30 days exactly! So it definitely holds a good charge and it doesn't take long to fully charge. I like all of the different attachment options but I would have liked it if it came with a stand or a bag to keep track of everything when it is not being used. Review Title: Wireless Nose & Ear Trimmer... Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 20 Pcs Lip Gloss Tubes Empty Balm Bottles Lip Balm Tubes for DIY Cosmetic Sample Containers Review Date: 2020/09/07 Store: JANYUN Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'JANYUN', 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Unit Count': '20.00 Count'} Review Text: This is the cutest set for DIY lip balm or lipsticks. They are so unique and definitely get noticed every single time you take them out and use them! My friends always have to touch them and hold them because just looking at them isn't enough. They want one for themselves with each new tube design they see. I am beginning to realize these would be a great idea for a DIY home based business. They are so unique and they actually are a good quality product. I am not sure how many times the lip brush can be used over and over again but I am looking into replacing them and it doesn't look like it will be a problem. Review Title: Super Cute!!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- Format your response exactly as follows: POSITIVE SUMMARY: [Your positive summary here] NEGATIVE SUMMARY: [Your negative summary here] OVERALL SUMMARY: [Your overall summary here]
raw_response:
**POSITIVE SUMMARY:**
The user has expressed strong appreciation for products that offer innovative features and effective results. They particularly liked makeup items that blend seamlessly into their skin tone, providing a natural finish without looking cakey. Lightweight textures in makeup and skincare were favored, and products that resulted in immediate visible improvements, especially for hydration and appearance, received high compliments. The convenience of certain products, like the efficiency of hair removal strips, was also highlighted. Overall, items that boast unique designs or functionalities seem to stand out positively in their experiences.

**NEGATIVE SUMMARY:**
Despite positive overall experiences, the user encountered some disappointing aspects among certain products. Notable issues included unpleasant textures and scents, particularly in eye creams and heavy concealers that were difficult to dispense and tended to cake on the skin. Additionally, certain products lacked clear instructions, causing confusion about their use frequency. The user also expressed frustration over the performance of some items that did not meet their expectations, leading to a less satisfactory experience.

**OVERALL SUMMARY:**
The user's purchase history reflects a blend of positive and negative experiences with beauty and skincare products. They gravitate towards innovative items that provide effective results and natural finishes. While they enjoy lightweight, easy-to-use products, some items have fallen short due to texture or usability issues. Disappointments with specific products highlight a need for clearer instructions and consistency in performance. Overall, the user’s preferences lean toward products that deliver instant benefits and pleasant experiences, while they remain wary of products that underperform or present usability challenges.

target_interaction.title: No Complaints
target_interaction.text: These reusable cotton rounds made from bamboo are so useful.  I have been doing skin care for years and not since I was in college did I use reusable face rounds.  Now that they are made with bamboo, they are so much softer and have better glidability on the skin.  They also seem to wash better than the older versions.  There is nothing worse than having brand new cotton rounds that look all dingy and gross from makeup removing.  These also come with a convenient bag that they can be washed in.  They do seem to hold up pretty well so far.
target_interaction.title_meta: Aisillac 20Pcs Reusable Cotton Rounds, 3.15inch Makeup Remover Pads Organic Bamboo Cotton Pads 3 Layers Zero Waste Washable Facial Cleansing Cosmetic Removal Wipe Cloth for Face Eye with Laundry Pouch
features: ♻️ Eco-Friendly & Zero Waste Lifestyle ♻️ The eco-friendly natural materials, the organic soft reusable makeup remover pads are made of 70% premium bamboo fiber and 30% high-quality cotton. Our bamboo cotton rounds can be washed and reused hundreds of times, saving you money and reducing landfill waste. One cotton pads can replace 200 or more disposable makeup remover wipes, equivalent to saving about 3 bamboo trees from being cut down! Our packaging is also recyclable and zeroes waste.

♻️ Non-Slip Design & Washable ♻️ These 3.15'' reusable makeup remover pads are stitched together to prevent slipping and dragging against your skin. Improve the usable area and replace countless disposable cleansing cottons, better than normal fabric makeup remover cloth ours came with a handy mesh cotton laundry bag for easy washing, They tumble dry well and do not shrink or shrivel in the dryer. Charcoal bamboo is far more durable than other materials and does not fluff.

♻️ For Everyone ♻️ The makeup remover wipes are suitable for face, body, nail to clean and remove cosmetics, no matter your skin is dry, oily, or sensitive, the soft makeup remover pads can be used to remove facial makeup, eye shadow, mascara, and lipstick. These 100% natural bamboo cotton makeup remover pads are very gentle and can be used for all skin types without fiber and fluff on the surface, even sensitive skin, dry skin, and delicate baby skin.

♻️ Easy to use ♻️ The reusable cotton rounds have a finger pocket design makes the makeup removal process easier, simply adding warm water or makeup remover to wet the pad then gently moving makeup pads in a circular motion over your makeup until all cosmetic is removed, it will leave both of your face and fingers clean, and bring soft smooth and fresh skin right away. You can also use these makeup cotton rounds to remove body makeup, finger nail gel polish.

♻️ Suitable for Home & Travel ♻️ The cotton rounds are lightweight and convenient, our portable cotton pads came with a pouch that can go in your travel bag, gym bag, or luggage for effective facial cleaning, makeup removal. The makeup remover pads is a perfect choice for makeup artists and eco-friendly supporters! The cotton pads are perfect as a gift for your friends, mom, wife, sisters, and other loved ones.
